entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
